entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued December 18 at 1:11PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT: MANDATORY WOOD-BURNING BAN IN EFFECT... The South Coast AQMD has extended a mandatory wood-burning ban for residents in the South Coast Air Basin for Sunday, December 18 to Monday, December 19. No-Burn days are declared to protect public health when levels of fine particulate air pollution in the region are forecast to be high.
